subdisciplines.name: International Security
subdisciplines.description: The study of the use of military force and the management of violent conflict between and within states.

subdisciplines.name: International Political Economy
subdisciplines.description: The study of the interactions between states and markets, and the distribution of power and resources in the international system.

subdisciplines.name: International Law
subdisciplines.description: The study of the legal rules and principles that govern the behavior of states and other international actors.

subdisciplines.name: Foreign Policy Analysis
subdisciplines.description: The study of the decision-making processes and strategies of states in their interactions with other states.
